name: Concorde Room, British Airways - Heathrow Terminal 5
description:
Just a teaser of a video.... Enjoy some highlights of BA's Concorde Room at Heathrow T5. Next video is on Tuesday and is a cracker.... British Airways First Class on the 787-9.... 

Enjoy.
